newsitem.title: USA: U.S. soybean weekly export sales highlights--USDA.
newsitem.headline: U.S. soybean weekly export sales highlights--USDA.

text.p: USDA soybean export sales highlights in latest reporting week:

Net sales reductions of 11,600 MT were primarily the result of increases for Italy (30,400 MT) and Mexico (9,700 MT) being more than offset by reductions for unknown destinations (47,000 MT) and the Netherlands (15,000 MT).

Sales of 193,800 MT for delivery during the 1997/98 marketing year were mainly the result of increases for unknown destinations (66,000 MT), Japan (58,400 MT), Taiwan (54,000 MT), and Mexico (35,400 MT) being partially offset by cancellations of 52,500 MT for China.
Exports of 151,300 MT were off 6 percent from the previous week and 2 percent from the 4-week average. The primary destinations were Mexico (55,300 MT), Japan (37,700 MT), and Italy (30,400 MT).
